org.flixel.system.input.TouchManager

type
class
...

Constructor

public new()
Constructor

Instance Variables

private _inactiveTouches : Array<Touch>

Storage for inactive touches (some sort of cache for them).

private _touchesCache : IntHash<Touch>

Helper storage for active touches (for faster access)

public touches : Array<Touch>

All active touches including just created, moving and just released.

Instance Methods

private add(touch : Touch) : Touch

Internal function for adding new touches to the manager
Parameters:
touch - new touch object
Returns:
added touch object

public destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

public handleTouchBegin(FlashEvent : nme.events.TouchEvent) : Void

Event handler so FlxGame can update touches.
Parameters:
FlashEvent - A TouchEvent object.

public handleTouchEnd(FlashEvent : nme.events.TouchEvent) : Void

Event handler so FlxGame can update touches.
Parameters:
FlashEvent - A TouchEvent object.

public handleTouchMove(FlashEvent : nme.events.TouchEvent) : Void

Event handler so FlxGame can update touches.
Parameters:
FlashEvent - A TouchEvent object.

public justReleasedTouches(?TouchArray : Array<Touch>) : Array<Touch>

Gets all touches which were just ended
Parameters:
TouchArray - optional array to fill with touch objects
Returns:
array with touches

public justStartedTouches(?TouchArray : Array<Touch>) : Array<Touch>

Gets all touches which were just started
Parameters:
TouchArray - optional array to fill with touch objects
Returns:
array with touches

private recycle(X : Float, Y : Float, PointID : Int) : Touch

Internal function for touch reuse
Parameters:
X - stageX touch coordinate
Y - stageY touch coordinate
PointID - id of the touch
Returns:
recycled touch object

public reset() : Void

Resets all touches to inactive state.

public update() : Void

Called by the internal game loop to update the touch position in the game world. Also updates the just pressed/just released flags.
